DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine toxicity profile MAGE-12 peptide vaccine patient refractory metastatic cancer express MAGE-12 antigen . II . Determine whether immunologic response , measure vitro sensitization assay , obtain administration regimen patient . III . Determine frequency administration regimen base immunologic response patient . IV . Determine immunologic parameter patient treat regimen . V. Determine clinical response rate patient treat regimen . PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients stratify accord disease ( metastatic cutaneous melanoma v tumor type ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive MAGE-12 peptide vaccine emulsify Montanide ISA-51 adjuvant subcutaneously ( SC ) weekly 4 dos . Arm II : Patients receive MAGE-12 peptide vaccine emulsify Montanide ISA-51 adjuvant SC every 3 week 4 dos . Patients progressive disease may receive interleukin-2 IV 15 minute every 8 hour , begin day immunization continue 4 day . Patients achieve stable disease mixed , partial , complete response continue vaccine therapy alone 24 total dos . Patients follow 3 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 26-56 patient ( 13-28 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 1 year .
